title: Local Foods
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Beer/Wine, Fusion, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A sandwich shop/deli/market offering sandwiches, soups, sides, salads and beverages. Menu is seasonal and uses mostly local ingredients. Has multiple clearly labeled vegan items, and at times, has a vegan dinner special. Some vegan dishes include a garden sammie, taco salad, chili, quinoa burger, potato salad, soba noodles and made-in-house chips. Has own parking lot. Atmosphere is clean and modern.
